tracer

Class Tracer<T extends Path>

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.Point
      • tracer.Tracer<T>

  • public class Tracer<T extends Path>
extends Point
    A Point that moves along a Path at some rate of speed, possibly speeding up and slowing down according to the curve specified by an Easing.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class tracer.Point
